Detailed Description

A FilterRule is used to specify a criterion on a data item. See also: ContainsRule, EqualsRule, RangeRule.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

FilterRule::FilterRule (   ) 
 

On construction a data item (the rule item) has to be given to specify the value which has to be tested.

Member Function Documentation

virtual BOOLEAN FilterRule::ExecuteRule (  const DataItem &  dataitem  )  [pure virtual]
 

ExecuteRule does the actual comparision between the data item given in the argument and the value stored when the filter rule is constructed.

Implemented in DcsLanguageFilterRule, PhoneNumberMatchRule, DistinctRule, EqualsRule, NotEqualsRule, RangeRule, LessRule, and GreaterRule.
